title: Bypass network khi cài Win
content:
Shift+F10 to open CMD, then run:
OOBE\BYPASSNRO

title: Stop service
content:
sc stop <service>
sc config <service> start= disabled

title: Set Win32 Priority Separation
content:
Optimizes foreground app performance by modifying system process priority behavior.

Apply:
Set-ItemProperty -Path "HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\PriorityControl" -Name "Win32PrioritySeparation" -Type DWord -Value 36

Check current value:
Get-ItemProperty -Path "HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\PriorityControl" -Name "Win32PrioritySeparation"

Unapply:
Set-ItemProperty -Path "HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\PriorityControl" -Name "Win32PrioritySeparation" -Type DWord -Value 2
